item.title: Realtime Devops solution for Monitoring
item.description: ChetanThapliyal/real-time-devops-monitoring Establish a comprehensive monitoring and alerting system for a web service using Prometheus, Alertmanager, and Blackbox Exporter.

item.title: Secure CI/CD Pipeline
item.description: Blog Post ChetanThapliyal/Secure-cloudNative-CI-CD-pipeline Implementation of a security-centric CI/CD pipeline, featuring code quality checks, vulnerability scanning, artifact publishing, secure Kubernetes deployment, and continuous monitoring.
